src:
Prediksi Persija vs Tira Persikabo 3 November 2019
03 Nov 2019, 10:55 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persija Jakarta menghadapi tantangan besar ketika menjamu Tira Persikabo pada pekan ke-26 Shopee Liga 1 2019, Minggu (3/11/2019). Duel ini merupakan dua duel tim terluka yang merindukan kemenangan.
Persija Jakarta belum keluar dari situasi mengkhawatirkan di Liga 1 2019. Klub berstatus juara musim lalu itu masih berusaha untuk menjauhi zona merah lantaran hingga 23 pertandingan baru mengumpulkan 24 poin.
Kedatangan pelatih Edson Tavares masih belum menunjukkan dampak signifikan. Persija di bawah asuhannya hanya mampu meraih empat poin dalam empat laga, perinciannya sekali menang, sekali imbang, dan dua kali kalah.
Laga melawan Tira Persikabo di Stadion Patriot Candrabhaga, Kota Bekasi, nanti bakal jadi momentum kebangkitan buat Persija. Apalagi pada putaran pertama, Macan Kemayoran dipermalukan 3-5. Jadi, laga ini sangat krusial buat Persija yang bertekad kembali ke jalur kemenangan sekaligus membalaskan dendam.
Pelatih Edson Tavares diprediksi masih akan mengandalkan Marko Simic di lini depan. Pergerakan bomber asal Kroasia itu akan ditopang Riko Simanjuntak di sisi kanan dan Rachmad Hidayat di sektor sayap kiri.
Situasi yang lebih buruk justru dialami Tira Persikabo. Klub asuhan Rahmad Darmawan itu sudah lama tak meraih kemenangan di Shopee Liga 1 2019.
Kemenangan terakhir yang diraih Osas Saha dkk. terjadi pada 19 Agustus 2019, ketika mengalahkan PSS Sleman dengan skor 3-1. Sejak saat itu, Tira Persikabo meraih lima kali imbang dan lima kali kalah.
Rentetan hasil minor itu membuat Tira Persikabo yang tadinya menghuni peringkat kedua, perlahan-lahan melorot ke posisi ketujuh dengan raihan 37 poin. Jadi, Tira Persikabo tentu tak ingin memperpanjang catatan negatif mereka dalam laga melawan Persija nanti.
Demi meraih poin maksimal, Tira Persikabo diprediksi akan menurunkan skema 4-3-3. Pelatih Rahmad Darmawan akan memainkan trio Wawan Febrianto, Ciro Alves, dan Osas Saha di lini depan untuk membongkar lini pertahanan Persija.
Pertandingan ini akan menjadi pertemuan ke-12 untuk kedua tim sepanjang sejarah. Persija Jakarta masih dominan dengan delapan kali menang, Tira Persikabo meraih sekali kemenangan, dan dua laga berakhir tanpa pemenang.
text:
Prediction of Persija vs Tira Persikabo 3 November 2019
Nov 3 2019, 10:55 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persija Jakarta faces a big challenge when entertaining Tira Persikabo on the 26th week of Shopee Liga 1 2019, Sunday (11/03/2019). This duel are two injured team duels who yearn for victory.
Persija Jakarta has not come out of a worrisome situation in League 1 2019. The club's championship status last season is still trying to stay away from the red zone because up to 23 new matches have collected 24 points.
The arrival of coach Edson Tavares has yet to show a significant impact. Persija under his tutelage is only able to win four points in four matches, the details of one win, one draw and two defeats.
The match against Tira Persikabo at the Patriot Candrabhaga Stadium, Bekasi City, will later become a momentum of awakening for Persija. Especially in the first round, the Kemayoran Tigers were humiliated 3-5. So, this fight is very crucial for Persija who is determined to return to the path of victory as well as avenge.
Coach Edson Tavares is predicted to still rely on Marko Simic up front. The Croatian bomber movement will be supported by Riko Simanjuntak on the right side and Rachmad Hidayat in the left wing sector.
A worse situation was experienced by Tira Persikabo. Rahmad Darmawan's club has not won a long time in Shopee Liga 1 2019.
The last victory achieved by Osas Saha et al. occurred on August 19, 2019, when they defeated PSS Sleman with a score of 3-1. Since then, Tira Persikabo has won five draws and lost five times.
The series of minor results made Tira Persikabo, who had occupied the second place, slowly slipped to seventh with 37 points. So, Tira Persikabo certainly does not want to extend their negative record in the match against Persija later.
For the sake of reaching maximum points, Tira Persikabo is predicted to reduce the 4-3-3 scheme. Coach Rahmad Darmawan will play the trio of Wawan Febrianto, Ciro Alves, and Osas Saha on the front lines to dismantle the Persija defense line.
This match will be the 12th meeting for the two teams in history. Persija Jakarta is still dominant with eight wins, Tira Persikabo won once, and two games ended without a winner.
